members.name: Seaside Café
members.description: A cozy café with a stunning view of the ocean, serving fresh seafood and local dishes.

members.name: Kalk Bay Boutique
members.description: An exclusive boutique offering a range of locally made clothing and accessories.

members.name: Harbour Tours
members.description: Guided boat tours around Kalk Bay’s scenic harbour and surrounding coastline.

members.name: Bay Art Gallery
members.description: Featuring contemporary art from local artists, Bay Art Gallery is a hub for creative expression.

members.name: Wave Riders Surf School
members.description: Learn to surf with professional instructors at Kalk Bay’s famous surf spots.

members.name: The Lighthouse Hotel
members.description: Luxury hotel offering panoramic views of the ocean and the mountains.

members.name: Kalk Bay Wellness Spa
members.description: A wellness retreat offering holistic treatments and therapies for relaxation and rejuvenation.
